Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Rhodium provides an imposing and prestigious office building on Blythe Valley Park, the West Midlands premier business park. The building benefits from a fully landscaped approach leading to a full height atrium which provides direct access into the suite.Â 

This office suite will be available from September 2019.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Grade A Office Space In Premier Midlands Business Park

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 45 Poplar Road has been designed to provide a market leading proposition in Solihull Town Centre.Â Â Staff wellbeing and amenities have been key considerations in the evolution of this landmark office building.Â Â 45 Poplar Road provides an occupancy ratio of 1:8 sq m, coupled with flexible office accommodation of 4,300 to 36,210 sq ft.Â Â So whether your business is 40 or 400 people, 45 Poplar Road can deliver a solution to meet your needs.Â Â Nearby there are a host of local amenities providing a range of leisure and retail facilities; add to this a high car parking provision, on-site shower, changing and cycle facilities, public transport on the doorstep, and a design led Grade A specification, 45 Poplar Road offers a truly unique proposition.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Flexible Open Plan Office Space To Let

Common.Highlight.Common.Text: To Be Confirmed On Completion EPC

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 751 Warwick Road is located in Solihull Town Centre and is a 5-minute walk to Solihull Train Station and its links to Birmingham City Centre and the Airport. The building was purpose built in 1978 as a headquarters office building and was recently acquired for redevelopment. The building currently comprises of c.20,000 sq ft of open plan office space. A planning application is currently being prepared for Grade A office refurbishment.

Adjacent to Five Ways Island, Tricorn House is ideally positioned to allow easy access to the city centre, inner ring road, motorway network, stations and Birmingham International Airport.Â  This newly refurbished air conditioned office space has undergone a major investment programme to include high speed lifts, new toilet, shower and disabled facilities to each floor.Â  Â In addition the Landlord has undertaken a refurbishment of the reception and has installed a basement gym with changing rooms.Â  Situated on the 9th Floor, Tricorn Studios offers a number of fully furnished office suites available for growing businesses.Â  The suites come with a kitchen, meeting rooms and superfast broadband.Â  Available on a flexible hassle-free set up that makes it easy for you to hit the ground running.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Situated adjacent to Five Ways Island, Tricorn House is ideally positioned to allow easy access to the city centre, inner ring road, motorway network, stations and Birmingham International Airport.Â  This new refurbished air-conditioned office space has undergone a major investment programme to include high speed lifts, internet connection, new toilets, shower and disabled facilities to each floor. The Reception has also undergone a full refurbishment together with a new basement gym with changing rooms.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The Seal building is located on the junction of Commercial Street / Blucher Street adjacent to the landmark mixed-use scheme, The Mailbox. It is in close proximity to both New Street and Moor Street train stations, providing excellent access to a variety of city centre amenities. The Seal building is a unique two storey, self-contained office, consisting of two floors of c.1,500 sq ft, each with a kitchen and W/C (including Disabled) facilities. The property can be let either as a whole or floor by floor.

Common.Photos.Common.ImageCaption: THE SEAL BUILDING_ BIRMINGHAM - 1ST FL OFFICES
THE SEAL BUILDING_ BIRMINGHAM - OPEN OFFICE

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 10 Brindleyplace is located on the Western side of the CBD in the multi-award winning office led mixed use estate that extends over 17 acres. The building fronts Oozells Square and provides easy access to Birmingham's principle stations Snow Hill and New Street, only 7 minutes walk away.Â The building is to be comprehensively refurbished to modern Grade A standards. Floorplates will provide large, light flexible open plan space in excess of 27,000 sq ft. Works are due to complete end of 2021.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Comprehensively Refurbished Grade A Office Space

Common.FloorPlans.Common.ImageCaption: RUM RUNNER_ REGENCY WHARF - GND FLOORPLAN

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The site is well located within short walking distance of the three main railway stations, Birmingham Snow Hill, Birmingham Moor Street and Birmingham New Street.Â  It is also within a half hour walk of Curzon Street Railway Station which will become home to the high speed rail link between London and Birmingham.Â Further to the major rail stations, the Birmingham Midland Metro Alliance Tram Line West Side extension passes in front of the site linking the city centre, including Birmingham New Street.Â The scheme benefits from expansive views across the Gas Street Canal Basin whilst being closely linked to the International Convention Centre, Symphony Hall and adjacent to the Hyatt Regency Hotel.Â  The scheme is also located close to The Arena Birmingham, Sea Life Birmingham, the IKON art gallery, the Birmingham Repertory Theatre Library.Â The proposed scheme offers a unique self-contained building, with excellent floor to ceiling heights enabling the ability to install Grade A specified offices with feature lighting and exposed services.Â  The scheme also benefits from period features, private external terraces and central courtyard ideal for events and functions.

Common.Photos.Common.ImageCaption: RUM RUNNER_ REGENCY WHARF - OFFICE SPACE

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Proposed Office Development With Excellent Travel Links

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Alpha is a landmark 27 storey office block located on the edge of the traditional Birmingham Core. Conveniently located on Suffolk Queensway it has excellent transport links being within 5 minutes walking distance of New Street Station. Located between both the central business district and Brindleyplace, it is also adjacent to the new Central Library and, Paradise and Arena Central Developments, and home to the new HSBC Headquarters. The building provides multiple contiguous floors which can satisfy larger requirements or can be subdivided from circa 3,500 sq ft.Â  The Landlord CEG have created Alpha Works collaboration/serviced office facility on the 20th and 21st floors to provide short term flexible space and hireable meeting facilities. The building also benefits from a ground floor cafÃ© and break out space, plus vast gym /spin studio, secure bike storage and health club style shower and changing facilities. For interactive tours of the differing office specifications ranging from modern open plan space to be designed as the occupier sees fit, to full turn-key fully fitted solutions please refer to our "VIEW 3D INTERACTIVE FLOOR PLAN" tab.

Alpha is a landmark 27 storey office block located on the edge of the traditional Birmingham Core. Conveniently located on Suffolk Queensway it has excellent transport links being within 5 minutes walking distance of New Street Station. Located between both the central business district and Brindleyplace, it is also adjacent to the new Central Library and, Paradise and Arena Central Developments, and home to the new HSBC Headquarters.Â 


The Landlord CEG have created Alpha Studios, a turnkey office facility on the 9th, 15th, 18th and 19th floors providing occupiers fully fitted flexible accommodation.Â  The perfect solution for growing businesses or those companies looking for a greater identity than that provided in a traditional fully serviced office facility.Â Â

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Fully Fitted, Flexible Turnkey Accommodation

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Arena Central is centrally located within 10 minutesâ walk from Birminghamâs main Rail Station, Birmingham New Street. The scheme is easily accessible by car, located just off Birminghamâs inner ring road at the junction of Holiday St and Suffolk St Queensway providing easy access to junction 6 of the M6 motorway, linkage to the west and M5 motorway via Broad St and the Hagley Road. Â Arena Central will also benefit from excellent access to Birminghamâs burgeoning tram network, with proposed tram stop opposite the schemes entrance adjacent to Centenary Square. The Midland Metro tram service â which runs from Wolverhampton to Snow Hill station â is currently undergoing an extension that will see it run through the centre of Birmingham, past New Street Station, to Arena Central and Centenary Square and then out to Edgbaston, target completion Q1 2022.Â  5 Centenary Square provides 135,000 sq ft of Grade A offices with typical floorplates of 21,000 sq ft.Â  5 Centenary Square offers 5,000 sq ft of high quality retail space with an inset terrace facing out towards Centenary Square. The upper floors are designed to accommodate a variety of occupier requirements, with a flexible layout arranged around a central lift core and two perimeter stair cores, with a balcony and terrace on the top floor. The exterior of 5 Centenary Square includes alternating glazed and fully opaque panels creating a tessellated, chequerboard effect around the building.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Strategic City Centre Hub Location

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Located in the heart of Birmingham's traditional core, 11 Waterloo St provides high quality offices in an attractive Grade II listed building, with excellent links to New Street and Snowhill Stations. The accommodation has been skilfully refurbished resulting in modern contemporary offices whilst retaining a number of the buildings period features. The 2nd floor suite is fully fitted, providing refurbished kitchen, open plan workstations (18 total), server plans, break out area and ample storage. The 1st floor provides a âready-madeâ board room including AV and conference desk.

Somerset House is perfectly located in the heart of Birmingham's Central Business District, just a few minutes' walk to both New Street and Snow Hill Train Stations.Â Â 

With cues from the building's Art Deco heritage, the entrance and reception areas have been completely remodelled using the very highest quality materials.Â  The bronze detailing, feature lighting and Carrara marble reception deliver the arrival experience of luxury boutique hotel.Â 

Space is provided fully fitted and designed to suit.Â  This bespoke "turnkey package" is amortised through the rent across the contract period.

Christchurch House is a superbly located prestigious building in a prominent position at the heart of Birmingham's vibrant Central Business District, fronting Victoria Square and opposite Birmingham's Town Hall and Council House. The property is ideally situated for easy access to Snow Hill and New Street railway stations providing regular rail services to all local commuter routes, Birmingham International Airport and London. The building also benefits from being close to the main retail district with the Bullring Shopping Centre just a few minutes away. Christchurch House is to undergo major refurbishment to provide high quality office space with a variety of period features. The accommodation is arranged over first and second floors with a dedicated ground floor entrance set behind an impressive facade. Space is available to let as a whole or on a floor by floor basis.

DESIGN PROPOSALS - SECOND FLOOR CAT A

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Office To Let In Prominent Position in Birmingham's Business District

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: A major 1.8million sq ft mixed use scheme, located on the former Birmingham Library/Paradise Circus site. Phase 1 Comprises two 2 Grade A spec builds totalling 355,000 sq ft fronting Chamberlain Square. As part of the Masterplan, 3 new public squares will be created with building amenities at the forefront of the development. Works includes upgrade to the existing Chamberlain Square with high quality materials and design. Phase 1 will also benefit from a fantastic retail/food & beverage offer with 9 retail units created providing over 36,000 sq ft. The Glen Howells designed Two Chamberlain Square provides 183,000 sq ft across 8 stories with large open plan floorplates over 20,000 sq ft with floor to ceiling glazing providing views across the upgraded Chamberlain Square.

New Street, Snow Hill and Moor Street stations are within walking distance as well as being in close proximity to the main bus routes in and out of the city. This location provides a number of amenities including popular restaurant and bars as well as being in close proximity to both Grand Central and the Bullring.

The property is located on Colmore Row, positioned in the heart of Birmingham office district.Â  This Headquarters style building is home to Lloyds Banking Group and provides efficient open plan flexible floor plates.Â  The building is situated within a short walk (400m) of Birmingham's primary stations Birmingham Snow Hill and Birmingham New Street Station and provides excellent access to a wealth of city centre amenities.Â  Space is available via sublease up to Q4 2025.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: The property is located adjacent to Arena Birmingham and short 2-minute walk from Brindleyplace, in a vibrant canal side situation. Arranged over three floors. Each suite provides newly refurbished, efficient, flexible, fully fitted, open plan office accommodation. The space can easily be partitioned into smaller working areas. The suites are available as flexible subleases until July 2021.

It provides fully refurbished, Grade A office space overlooking St Philips Cathedral and has been re-glazed and refurbished throughout.Â  One Temple Row represents a stunning opportunity to acquire flexible open plan office floorplates space with floor to ceiling windows in a prime City Centre location.Â  Â At the end of 2020 the building will benefit from brand new reception, communal roof terraces, business lounge, cafÃ©, and enhanced cycle, changing and shower facilities.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
85-89 Colmore Row is situated in the heart of Birmingham's central business district. The building offers prime city centre office accommodation in a highly prominent location on the junction of Colmore Row and Newhall Street. 85-89 Colmore Row offers Grade A office space set within a Grade II listed building, providing the perfect combination of period presence and modern accommodation. The 1st floor provides traditional Grade A space including recessed lighting, suspended ceiling and air conditioning. The suite has excellent floor to ceiling height, dedicated toilets and shower facilities, plus vast floor to ceiling picture windows long over Colmore Row. The 4th floor provides alternative loft-style accommodation with exposed sofit, brickwork and services with feature pendant LED lighting.

A video tour of the available office space can be found within the 'DOWNLOAD PDF BROCHURE' section of this web page.

Â Edmund House benefits from excellent transport links, located less than 5 minutes walk of New Street and Snow Hill station. Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Louisa Ryland House is located in the heart of the Colmore Business District. Within easy walking distance of New Street and Snowhill Stations. The building benefits from the Cityâs best amenities on its doorstep. This Grade 2 listed building has been comprehensively refurbished to provide open plan flexible floor plates, with an array of period features, set alongside modern cutting-edge design and specification. Floor plates provide Grade A accommodation with fully access raised floor, exposed services and feature pendant lighting.Â Floor plates can be combined or subdivided to suit a number of size requirements. Furthermore, the building can be split to provide a self-contained building with independent access totalling c.23,000sq ft. 2nd and 3rd floors are currently inter-connected via a feature spiral staircase providing c.29,000 sq ft.

The building has undergone a comprehensive refurbishment to provide Grade A office space within walking distance of Snow Hill Train Station and Colmore Row. 

The building is located adjacent to the newly created Bull St Metro stop and opposite Legal & Generalâs major refurbishment project The Lewis Building. 

4 Temple Row has been re-glazed and fully refurbished including upgraded and remodelled reception together with clear open plan flexible floor plates benefiting from a corner aspect and excellent levels of natural light.

A video tour of the available office space can be found within the 'DOWNLOAD PDF BROCHURE' section of this web page.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 154 Great Charles Street is located adjacent to PWC new headquarters, in the Paradise Birmingham Development and has excellent connections to both Snowhill and New street Railway stations. Great Charles street is also the main route connecting the city to the A38 and other national motorway links. The building consists of 8 floors, vacant suites have been refurbished to provide high quality offices, comprising of exposed services and brickwork. The building now provides a new reception, common area and 2 lifts leading to the upper floors. Floorplates provide an attractive office space for occupiers seeking high quality space with excellent views of the city centre. The building combine with its sister building Charles House is undergoing major upgrade works to increase occupier amenity, including, new: shower/changing facilities, hireable meeting rooms, roof top terrace and winter garden.

The Lewis Building is an outstanding new office building in the heart of Birminghamâs business quarter, the re-awakening of the former Temple Court and original Lewisâs department store. The high quality 119,000 sq ft Grade A specification re-captures the grandeur of the original department store with high quality finishes be-fitting of the buildingâs heritage, whilst delivering modern/21st century office workspace designed for the occupier. Constructed over ground and 7 upper floors, with a new 7th floor suite with external terrace providing fabulous views of the cityscape. The building benefits from an expansive reception area, set behind a new entrance, with a library and casual meeting area for tenants. The office demise is of high specification with an occupation density designed to accommodate 1 person per 8 sq m. Generous and secure car parking is provided within the basement of the building. The floor plate can be subdivided into a variety of sizes to include 4,850, 7,800, 8,400 and 11,400 sq ft.

Common.Strapline.Common.Text: Magnificent Office Development in Birmingham's Business District

The building sits adjacent to Birminghamâs premier development- Paradise and next to PwCâs new Birmingham HQ. Lock-14's uniqueÂ offer includes a variety of original features mixed with contemporary Grade A office design, including feature lighting, exposed services, private external terraces and central courtyard ideal for events and functions. The building also provides a ground floor âHubâ including hireable meeting rooms, breakout space, kitchen and direct access to the courtyard, perfect for outdoor meetings. The building also benefits from ample secure cycle storage and dedicated shower and changing facilities.

New Street and Snow Hill railway stations are within easy walking distance. Its location, just minutes from the regionâs motorway network. The building now provides a new reception, common area and 3 lifts leading to the upper floors. Floorplates provide an attractive office space for occupiers seeking high quality space with excellent views of the city centre. The building combine with its sister building 154 GCS is undergoing major upgrade works to increase occupier amenity, including, new: shower/changing facilities, hireable meeting rooms, roof top terrace and winter garden.Â The building also benefits from UV lighting to kill and prevent the spread of viruses.

134 Edmund St is located on Edmund Street in the heart of Birminghamâs Business Core. 134 Edmund St benefits from excellent transport links, located less than 5 minutesâ walk of New Street and Snow Hill station.Â  The property has undergone a comprehensive refurbishment to include, high specification office floor plates, common areas and new feature entrance via a Grade II listed faÃ§ade off Edmund Street. The 4th floor is available as a whole or in part.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Occupying a prominent position in Birminghamâs bustling commercial heart, the revered Colmore Business District, No.1 Colmore Square offers a unique opportunity for office space in the cityâs most sought-after location. Perfectly situated, with a wealth of amenities on the doorstep, and easy connectivity to the wider UK. No.1 Colmore Square overlooks the attractive landscaped public realm at the heart of Birminghamâs most prestigious commercial district and offers a superb range of amenities. Its location benefits from unrivalled transport connections and facilities for those who travel by car, rail, Metro or bicycle and it also offers the best of the cityâs retail and leisure offering. Whether it's a bite to eat in Michelin-starred restaurants, stylish bars and artisanal coffee shops or some retail therapy at premier brands such as Selfridges and Harvey Nichols or independent boutiques and markets, Birmingham has something to cater for all tastes. The building is finished to an exceptional standard, with all the facilities expected of one of Birmingham's premier office buildings.

The property commands views across the city and has class leading connectivity. Â Specification includes: EPC B rating 39 points, high performance coolite TM solar control curtain walling with advanced thermal insulation and solar control, original architectural stone features to main facades retained and improved, high quality double glazed reception, high specification Daikin VRV III heating and cooling system, plus active management support. The 3rd floor is fully fitted ready to occupy space.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text:
Cornerblock offers a wide range of Grade A workspace in the heart of the Colmore Business District, close to Snow Hill station. A new, vibrant and inspiring workplace for businesses of all sizes and sectors. Cornerblock also offers an on-site gym, bike storage, showers and ample parking. The top floor is home to one of Birmingham's largest private roof terraces which features wi-fi connectivity and seating areas, giving views across the city centre whether working or relaxing. Every space in Cornerblock benefits from floor to ceiling glazing bringing plenty of natural light to the offices. The part 4th floor space provides fully fitted turnkey space with 46 open plan workstations 4 x meeting rooms, generous reception and break out space.

Links to virtual tours can be found in the 'DOWNLOAD PDF BROCHURE' section of this web page.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: 19 Cornwall Street is located in the heart of Birmingham's Colmore Business District. The building will undergo a comprehensive refurbishment to provide new efficient Grade A space with unique design and interventions not seen before in Birmingham.Â  Works are anticipated to start later this year completing Q1 2022. A new double height entrance leading to a stunning atrium with feature lighting, new floor finishes, reception desk and interior design will provide an impressive environment for staff, clients and visitors. Onsite amenity will also be market leading providing, cafÃ© and retail opportunities at ground floor level, external communal and private roof terrace space, basement cycle and gym hub with excellent shower and cycle provision, while retaining an impressive secure basement parking ratio.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Located at the heart of Birminghamâs Colmore Business District, One Snowhill is adjacent to Snow Hill station â providing access to mainline rail services and the Midlands Metro, as well as an endless list of leisure, retail and business opportunities. One Snowhill is an attractive, Grade A, fully glazed and steel framed building, providing flexible and efficient floorplates with an abundance of natural light enjoyed by existing tenants KPMG LLP, Barclays Bank PLC and DWF. Totalling 263,000 sq ft, One Snowhill is arranged over basement, ground and 11 upper floors. Only the 3rd and 4th floor remain available. The remaining floors are undergoing a comprehensive refurbishment to provide a unique semi exposed ceiling solution providing the perfect mix of modern styling and functional, flexible space. Floorplates can be subdivided to provide suites of 11,840 sq ft and 12,056 sq ft.

Common.LongDescription.Common.Text: Faraday Wharf is part of the thriving Innovation Birmingham campus which is home to a vibrant community of over 170 digital tech start-ups, scale ups and large corporates. Companies based in Faraday Wharf have full access to all the campus facilities including a wide range of events and meet up groups all designed to connect you and help your business grow. The campus is a magnet for tech innovation particularly for those businesses looking to scale, grow or collaborate. Many are attracted by âSerendipâ - a corporate innovation programme that matches start-ups and SMEs with large corporates or public sector organisations to solve innovation-based challenges. Partners in the Serendip programme include GymShark, National Express, West Midlands Academic Health Science Network and Barclays Eagle Labs. The campus is owned, managed and operated by Bruntwood SciTech - the UKâs largest property portfolio dedicated to the growth of the science and technology sector. Joining Bruntwood SciTech means joining âA network of thriving innovation districtsâ which includes over 500 businesses and an extensive business support and community events programme. The Collective is an online portal where over 50,000 members of the Bruntwood community across Manchester, Leeds, Liverpool and Birmingham network, share ideas, collaborate, post news and events and access partner offers and discounts.

iCentrum offers contemporary coworking, flexible office space and serviced offices all designed with digital tech businesses in mind. Centred around a large, open plan events space and cafÃ©, iCentrum is a hub for the campus community of over 170 digital tech businesses ranging in size from start-up to scale-up. The campus is a magnet for tech innovation particularly for those businesses looking to scale, grow or collaborate. Many are attracted by âSerendipâ - a corporate innovation programme that matches start-ups and SMEs with large corporate or public sector organisations to solve innovation-based challenges. Partners in the Serendip programme include GymShark, National Express, West Midlands Academic Health Science Network and Barclays Eagle Labs.
